QuestData.Title: The Secret of Nahom
QuestData.Description: There is an old story about Nahom. It speaks of how a powerful prophet named Atulhet held off troves of enemies by channeling the power of the sun through this very temple.$B$BMost believe the tale to be just a legend, but that power... would certainly be useful to us now.$B$BThe vile Neferset have ransacked Atulhet's tomb. They've taken any artifacts of power and shattered the tablets that encode his memories.$B$BGo to the Tombs of the Precursors to the east and retrieve any fragments that you find.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find them, $n? Were they salvageable?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. Let's see if we can find anything of importance.
